567990.name: Sally Face - Season Pass
567990.description:
CONTENTS

  • Episode Two: The Wretched

  • Episode Three: The Bologna Incident

  • Episode Four: The Trial

  • Episode Five: Memories and Dreams

  • The Sally Face Original Soundtrack

Episode Two: The Wretched (2017)

Sally Face searches for ghosts in an attempt to uncover the truth about Larry.

Episode Three: The Bologna Incident (2018)

Sally Face and his friends begin an investigation at school that becomes much more than they expected.

Episode Four: The Trial (2018)

Sal and Larry face a formidable darkness.

Episode Five: Memories and Dreams (2019)

The dark mystery comes to an end.

DLC INSTRUCTIONS

In your Steam Client, go to your Library and click on Sally Face. On the right, you should see a check box for the DLC to install. Make sure that is checked. You can also right click on "Sally Face", in your Library list, to access more options. Once the DLC is installed, you can continue from your save into episode two or start a new game from any episode.

For Support, email mike@portablemoose.com
567990.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 德语, 繁体中文, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
